title: Worked Solution
text:
Firstly, we can distribute the $$ rac{2}{3}$$ on the left side of the equation:

(2/3)(3𝑚-6) $$=$$ $$ rac{2}{3}$$ * 3𝑚 - $$ rac{2}{3}$$ * $$6$$
2𝑚 - $$4$$ $$=$$ $$5$$ - 𝑚

Next, we can combine like terms on both sides:

3𝑚 + 𝑚 $$=$$ $$5$$ + $$4$$
4𝑚 $$=$$ $$9$$

Finally, we can solve for 𝑚 by dividing both sides by 4:

𝑚 $$=$$ $$ rac{9}{4}$$

Therefore, the solution to the equation is 𝑚 $$=$$ $$ rac{9}{4}$$.
